page.title: 17Recreation (2), Bowness.
page.content:
{Fox Hunting}is very popular in the area,the{hounds}being followed over the fells on{foot.
Sailing{Windermere Class}yachts is on the increase as is all forms of boating on Windermere. There is now a {registration scheme}for all{powerboats on the lake,similar to the one used for cars on the road. { {Skiing}and{Orienteering}are two sports which are rapidly growing in popularity. { {Water Skiing}is now concentrated on { {Windermere}as a result of{speed {restrictions}on other local waters.
